      • getReadFiles

        public static List<File> getReadFiles(CasParser parser)
                               throws IOException
        Get the list of Files used as input to the Cas assembly.
        Parameters:
        parser - the CasParser instance to parse the read files from; can not be null.
        Returns:
        a List of Files of the read files. The order in the list is the order of the files in the cas. This order is crucial to parsing any alignment data.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem parsing the cas file.
        NullPointerException - if parser is null.
